1422920.name: Kine Soundtrack
1422920.description: Kine's award winning jazz soundtrack is actually one giant modular song! The OST for Kine was entirely built around a single, looping bassline. As you progress through the puzzles, new layers of music are added on top, so as the puzzles becomes more complex, so does the music! Our heroes' journey is accompanied by music that unfolds into a rich and complex symphony, just as is their story.
